name: Green Heart
description:
So have you played a RPG as an... OGRE?
  • A Story-based adventure RPG in a monster's perspective
  • No random encounters
  • Gather powerful monster allies
  • 200% pixel arts
  • Homemade organic soundtracks
  • Spent 500+ sticky notes just to make a perfect storyline and a perfect ending(s)
  • Protects monster rights

I have slayed thousands of monsters in my life while playing good old hack and slash RPGs, but I thought "Hey, do they really deserve to die?" Then I felt pity. Perhaps they have their own family and friends!

From that time, I always stood on the monster's side. But every game I've encountered, they treat monsters as a tool, use them as their puppets, kill them to earn experience. How cruel!

So we wanted to make a story from a petty monster in a RPG world. You will experience entirely different things that you have never been through while playing as a mighty human hero.

Demo (Part 1) is out now!
